comments.comment: Palamuwa kiyanna one api kisima desapalanayakata pattak nata....api bedanne ekama hadden...ranjan oba api daka tibenewa auttiyata asadaranayta nagee sitnawa sina mawda saba jeevitayeda...rajan oba me dan oya karapu de anumata kareemata baha...eyata hetuwa oba pasal yana kuda daruwek men ekata eka karana eka mewani anuwana kriya anuwanai.....ohuta piliturak denna tibunanam kriyawen penwanna..kenek pahat karpu bala kriya walata obat eyata eyitat wada..bala.. kiruya karpu kirya harida...dan desa palakayan ladaru pasal wala lamun karana kriya galapenewada..mewani ayata puluwandda janatawak palanaya karanna..meyada desa palana aramunu....ekata eka kireema....janata niyojitayan janatawata adarssamat wemin ..nihadawa janatawata awankawa sewaya karanna..kawawat vivichanaya nokaranna..oba yana niwardi maga yanna desa premiyek wenna.uda balagena kela gasa ganne sarilankia apamaya......essage oluwe tiyenne jarawa..namut essa uda paninawa mama sudana kiyala.kagewat sudu hu gannawat kade yannawat awassa naha..saba desa premi kenek janata niyojitayek hatiyata janatawa tulata pivisenna..hadawtin asa mole pavichchi karanna.sit wala tibena wirrya kordaya pali ganeem ata harala janatawata sewaya karanna .. vihilu wada karanne natiwa.....palita tewarap purala wage enna...rata uddayen beragatta mahidda matu dunta api gaurawa karanawa ohu nisa api ada rate higa kawat nidahasa ennawa...api ude sawa wadala kiyanne ....me enna dusita palakayan natiwela.pinwat darmika desa palakayan bihi wewa kiya....
comments.author: Udhudh Champa

replies.replyComment: Udhudh Champa  diunuwata simawak na.  Yaluwa. Adhask thiynawanm. Anith ayge pahsuwa gana hithla ketian kianna . Mokada meka kiwanne api wage diuniu wenna daglana minissu.
